text: Netizens are eager to learn more about Kelly Clarkson’s ex-husband. The renowned singer and actress Kelly Clarkson once again finds herself in the news after she opened up about the recent happenings in her life, including updates regarding her dating life following her divorce. As such, fans of the American Idol Season 1 winner have come out to ask about her romantic escapades of late, including details of her previous marriage. So, here’s everything to know about Clarkson’s former spouse, including his work and their kids. Who was Kelly Clarkson married to? Kelly Clarkson was previously married to Brandon Blackstock. Clarkson and her former husband met one another in May 2006 during a rehearsal for the Academy of Country Music Awards. At the time, he was still with his first wife, Melissa Ashworth. After his split from Ashworth, Blackstock reconnected with Clarkson at the Super Bowl in 2012. As per People, the two soon went on their first date in February 2012. They got engaged in December of the same year, before tying the knot on October 20, 2013. However, after seven years of union, Kelly Clarkson filed for divorce from Brandon Blackstock. Having submitted the legal request in 2020, they finalized their separation in March 2022. What is Brandon Blackstock’s job? Kelly Clarkson’s ex-husband is a talent manager and television producer. Brandon Blackstock kickstarted his career in the entertainment industry under the tutelage of his father, Narvel Blackstock, at Starstruck Entertainment. He soon established himself in the field, helping shape the careers of prominent musicians, such as Blake Shelton. Blackstock also served as his ex-wife Clarkson’s manager till he stopped working for his father’s company. Additionally, he has worked as an executive producer for The Kelly Clarkson Show and was a part of the additional crew on Blake Shelton Live: It’s All About Tonight. How many kids do Kelly Clarkson and Brandon Blackstock have? Kelly Clarkson and her ex-husband, Brandon Blackstock, are proud parents to two children. The former pair welcomed their firstborn, a daughter named River Rose, on June 12, 2014. Their son, Remington Alexander, arrived on April 12, 2016. After they filed for divorce, Clarkson received primary physical custody of the kids in November 2020. The three-time Grammy winner has since opened up about the effect of her split from Blackstock on their children on several occasions. During a 2023 appearance on Glennon Doyle’s podcast, We Can Do Hard Things, Clarkson shared, “Your kids will still have a hard time. It doesn’t matter if you stay, it doesn’t matter if you go, I am still having conversations [with my kids] three years later.”

Netizens are eager to learn more about Kelly Clarkson’s ex-husband. The renowned singer and actress Kelly Clarkson once again finds herself in the news after she opened up about the recent happenings in her life, including updates regarding her dating life following her divorce. As such, fans of the American Idol Season 1 winner have come out to ask about her romantic escapades of late, including details of her previous marriage.

So, here’s everything to know about Clarkson’s former spouse, including his work and their kids.

Who was Kelly Clarkson married to?

Kelly Clarkson was previously married to Brandon Blackstock.

Clarkson and her former husband met one another in May 2006 during a rehearsal for the Academy of Country Music Awards. At the time, he was still with his first wife, Melissa Ashworth.

After his split from Ashworth, Blackstock reconnected with Clarkson at the Super Bowl in 2012. As per People, the two soon went on their first date in February 2012. They got engaged in December of the same year, before tying the knot on October 20, 2013.

However, after seven years of union, Kelly Clarkson filed for divorce from Brandon Blackstock. Having submitted the legal request in 2020, they finalized their separation in March 2022.

What is Brandon Blackstock’s job?

Kelly Clarkson’s ex-husband is a talent manager and television producer.

Brandon Blackstock kickstarted his career in the entertainment industry under the tutelage of his father, Narvel Blackstock, at Starstruck Entertainment. He soon established himself in the field, helping shape the careers of prominent musicians, such as Blake Shelton.

Blackstock also served as his ex-wife Clarkson’s manager till he stopped working for his father’s company. Additionally, he has worked as an executive producer for The Kelly Clarkson Show and was a part of the additional crew on Blake Shelton Live: It’s All About Tonight.

How many kids do Kelly Clarkson and Brandon Blackstock have?

Kelly Clarkson and her ex-husband, Brandon Blackstock, are proud parents to two children.

The former pair welcomed their firstborn, a daughter named River Rose, on June 12, 2014. Their son, Remington Alexander, arrived on April 12, 2016. After they filed for divorce, Clarkson received primary physical custody of the kids in November 2020.

The three-time Grammy winner has since opened up about the effect of her split from Blackstock on their children on several occasions. During a 2023 appearance on Glennon Doyle’s podcast, We Can Do Hard Things, Clarkson shared, “Your kids will still have a hard time. It doesn’t matter if you stay, it doesn’t matter if you go, I am still having conversations [with my kids] three years later.”
